title: Button, ca. 1898
description: Components -a,-b are on card G. Spanish Army Infantry Officer type worn in Spanish American War. -a,b Spain; -c/e Paris, France; -f possibly Spain. Semicircular convex buttons; showing crowned royal arms of Spain between columns with "Plus ultra" and "Infantria" on scrolls. -a,b marked on reverse: P Feu e Hijos Madrid Barcelona; -c,d marked on reverse: T W and W HM Paris

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, ca. 1898.
ca. 1898. Brass. Gift of  Elisha Dyer. 1940-1-5-a/c.
